=== Testing vmovshdup ===
Testing vmovshdup (128-bit):
Before: src=[1.00, 2.00, 3.00, 4.00]
After:  dst=[2.00, 2.00, 4.00, 4.00]
  PASS: 128-bit vmovshdup

Testing vmovshdup (256-bit):
Before: src=[1.00, 2.00, 3.00, 4.00, 5.00, 6.00, 7.00, 8.00]
After:  dst=[2.00, 2.00, 4.00, 4.00, 6.00, 6.00, 8.00, 8.00]
  PASS: 256-bit vmovshdup

Testing vmovshdup (128-bit memory):
Before: [1.500000, 2.500000, 3.500000, 4.500000]
After : [2.500000, 2.500000, 4.500000, 4.500000]
  PASS: 128-bit vmovshdup (memory)

Testing vmovshdup with special values:

Test case 1:
Before: [nan, inf, -inf, 0.000000]
After : [inf, inf, 0.000000, 0.000000]
  PASS: Special values case 1

Test case 2:
Before: [0.000000, -0.000000, 0.000000, 340282346638528859811704183484516925440.000000]
After : [-0.000000, -0.000000, 340282346638528859811704183484516925440.000000, 340282346638528859811704183484516925440.000000]
  PASS: Special values case 2

Test case 3:
Before: [0.000000, 1000000015047466219876688855040.000000, -0.000000, -1000000015047466219876688855040.000000]
After : [1000000015047466219876688855040.000000, 1000000015047466219876688855040.000000, -1000000015047466219876688855040.000000, -1000000015047466219876688855040.000000]
  PASS: Special values case 3
